entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 17 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023
